Apprentice Atra:
Good. I like your attitude. I know it seems daunting, but the Muckrokians must die! Kill Mucrokian Fanatics, Mucrokian Ascetics, Mucrokian Saviors, Mucrokian Prophets, Contaminated Mucrokians, and Awakened Mucrokians. Collect Mucrokian Hide and Quality Mucrokian Hide. Only the skins of our oppressors can soothe Eva's pain.
Collect as many as you can. If you bring enough back, I will exchange them for Dynasty accessory recipes.
